label: build: all
command: nix build .#nixosConfigurations.pluto.config.system.build.toplevel && nix build .#nixosConfigurations.juno.config.system.build.toplevel && nix build .#nixosConfigurations.flore.config.system.build.toplevel && nix build .#nixosConfigurations.charon.config.system.build.toplevel
